website_summaries.verdict: Despite some sizing issues, these yoga pants are a good choice if you are looking for a comfortable fit and an affordable price.
pros: Affordable yoga pants that also offer quality and comfort, thanks to the breathable material
cons: Sizes tend to be somewhat inconsistent, and they may run too tight or too long
A bit sheer if the fit is too tight

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT HAS CHANGED, NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I am an unhappy returning customer. You've changed the make of this product from "80% Nylon 20% spandex" to "87% nylon 13% spandex." This is NOT the same product. The quality of the pant has significantly decreased. I had to order a bigger size (small to medium) to avoid the see-through effect when squatting and the pants do not hug the body the same. I am constantly pulling them up. I will NOT be ordering again. You need to make a new product number when you change a product dramatically. Incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LadyR

customer_reviews.title: Apparently good quality and everything but see through
customer_reviews.text: Apparently good quality and everything but see through. I'm an M and bought and L, when I went to do the "bend over" test...
customer_reviews.author: Liv F. Cott

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Issues
customer_reviews.text: How annoying. There are 2 versions of these leggings. I have 3 pairs of 90 degrees leggings (these ones) that are "made in vietnam" that I adore. I ordered them 3 months ago. I ordered 2 more on black friday thinking that I would be getting the same pair of leggings. I'm a size 6 and I ordered a medium. The leggings I ordered previously, from Vietnam, fit perfectly and are squat-proof. I love them. The ones I received today are made in China, too small, and not squat-proof! Returning these. Come on, guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of these leggings were amazing (and still are!) I've had them over a year, and I use them for running, yoga, hiking/backpacking, you name it. They have held up, and are unbelievably comfortable. SADLY, the second and third pair are not the same. They are thinner, so when you put them on they are see through. They fit fine, not too tight, but bend over and you'll give someone an eyefull. They changed the materials and percentages, and where they made.
customer_reviews.author: Camanda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bend over
customer_reviews.text: I bought these leggings after reading all of the great reviews and was so excited to find a pair that weren’t see through. When I first got them they seemed nice and thick enough that I was in the clear of flashing everyone if I bent over. So you can imagine my horror when after wearing them all day, I thought “I better do the bend over look through test” just to be sure only to have my husband tell me that they are so see through he could read the tag on the back of my underwear. Definitely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_Lamm

customer_reviews.title: 2019 line is different!
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the seller. I have several pairs of yoga pants from this seller & love ever single one of them...except this pair. :( Something has changed with the new 2019 line. The fabric listed inside is the same but it looks & feels completely different from the last pair I ordered. I had even used the “order again” selection from my last purchase. The new fabric is shinier, more spandex-ier, like 80s stretch pants. They are slightly higher-waisted than their usual high waist, and the fit & feel just does not work for me this time around. I’m afraid they’ve lost a customer & I’ve lost my go-to supplier for athleisure wear.
customer_reviews.author: K Bruce

customer_reviews.title: The new quality is GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of 90 Degree’s from TJ Maxx that I bought in 2017 and they are amazing. Perfect thickness + stretch, and super flattering. I bought two different colors of the “new 2019” leggings (black and a dusty purple) and they’re both garbage. Super thin. Even the black ones were totally unforgiving. I’m amazed by how a company could take such a quality product and completely torpedo it. I guess they’ll do anything to save a buck, right?
customer_reviews.author: anonymousinCA

customer_reviews.title: Too much dye.
customer_reviews.text: I received these and tried them on, went to show my mom, and she gasped. The dye from the leggings had transferred all over my hands, on my white nail polish, and all over my face where I had rubbed my eyes. It also ruined my new watch I got for Christmas. My legs were also blue. Had to take 2 showers to get it all off, but it still won’t come out of my watch. I don’t even want to attempt to wash these due to how much dye is in them. It’s normal for things like jeans to have dye, but NEVER as much as these leggings have. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: So sad!
customer_reviews.text: So sad with this product. I’ve bought these leggings numerous times and I have even recommended them to friends and family. However, the leggings I received were extremely see-through and completely different quality, they are already separating at the seams. Now I’m nervous to purchase any more..
customer_reviews.author: Rymom

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! Great quality, good durable stitching these pants fit me perfectly I'm 5"3 150 but very muscular with a tiny waistline, but large quadriceps and bum .Finding workout gear to fit me in the legs means going 2 sizes up making the waistband super loose not these bad boys just ordered 2 more
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Beware of color transfer!
customer_reviews.text: All of my leggings are 90 Degrees by Reflex but this are my first pair of less cotton more spandex leggings. I ordered a pair in black and I tried them on without washing first (normal thing to do) and my nails, skin, apple watch band etc were all dyed purple. I had no trouble getting it off of my skin with a make up wipe but my nails were ruined and my apple watch band required nail polish remover to remove the stain. I am washing them now but may wash twice after reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED! Buy them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are AMAZING - the quality is seriously as good as my Spanx leggings. I’m so so impressed. After reading reviews, I decided to size down one to an XS (I normally wear a small) and am glad I did. They fit perfectly. Will be buying more colors. Don’t hesitate, buy these! OH and I’m wearing the “tainted rose” color. @shadylaneblog on Instagram :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan // @shadylaneblog on IG

customer_reviews.title: WASH WASH WASH
customer_reviews.text: This leggings are pretty close quality to lululemon, yet if you wear these black pair before you wash them, the excess dye will ruin your life, it stained my white sports bra, my white bed sheets, dye was on my hands that stained my phone charger and airpods case, also my legs were blue and I had to double exfoliate to get off most of the dye but still had dye patches in excessively sweaty place, like between my thighs and behind my knees. I double washed these in hot water to remove all the excess dye but the dye did permanently stain my other items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: used to be good, now disappointing :(
customer_reviews.text: The cut/fit is okay, but this is the third pair of these leggings I have purchased and the quality seems to have diminished a lot since my last purchase. I loved the first and second pairs(purchased about a year ago) but now the fabric feels thin and itchy and does not stay in place, so you have to pull them up and adjust constantly. When I received them they had a strong smell that it took like 3 washes to get rid of. They still fit decently and so far haven’t snagged or torn, but I’m very disappointed in the drop in fabric quality.
customer_reviews.author: Morganne

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love them but poor quality item
customer_reviews.text: I loved these for the first few weeks until I washed them I started noticing some seams coming loose but it got way out of hand when a seam in the back basically unraveled almost all the way to the top of the tights... poorly made The fit and fabric feels great however the stitching is very very poor For reference I washed these a total of 2 times before this happened and I even air dry all my leggings
customer_reviews.author: fjjimenez

customer_reviews.title: These are the best leggings under $50!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy these. They're amazing. I've bought several different leggings on Amazon for around the same price, and these were hands down the winners. I am 5'2"/120/athletic/curvy and bought the small in black. The fit is perfect (snug, high waist). They are a soft, sleek material. POCKETS (side and one hidden inner). The legs end right at the top of my feet, fully covering my ankles but without bunching. My butt looks fantastic. I've already bought them in pink and plan to buy a second black pair once they are back in stock! They do make an annoying swishing sound when I walk/run (because they’re basically made of plastic). Not gonna lie, the sound drives me nuts. Still a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrainne

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Contacted both 90 degree and amazon and both only offer a 30 day replacement or return. I was only wanting a replacement pair. Both said no! I am a very frequent buyer from amazon and I’ve bought several of these yoga pants. But because the stitching was faulty and I didn’t see the defect until 6 weeks after purchase....no replacement! I will never buy from them again!! Very poor customer service and very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodee Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Totally see through
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with these. I bought both the plain black and the snowflake since they were different percentages of spandex. The snowflake (heathered) pair were very silky and felt nice...until I stretched them a bit. You could see my whole hand! The black pair fit a tiny bit smaller and were also not opaque at all. Even just sitting you could see my knees through the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Carisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd never wasted the money on these. I've worn them twice, today being the second day, just for travel (sitting on a plane, driving, minimal walking) and they're already coming apart. Can't return them obviously because they've been worn but these are pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin C

customer_reviews.title: Fit is Perfect, but beware of staining on clothes and body (black pair)
customer_reviews.text: I love 90 degree leggings. I have almost 6 pairs, all in lighter colors. I needed basic black leggings with a size phone pocket and decided to give these a go. I did not wash them beforehand which was a huge mistake. They stained my jacket, white sneakers and tote bag. Luckily I was able to get the stains out of my jacket by throwing it in the washing machine, but my sneakers are permanently stained :/ the fit is perfect and after I washed them there was no color runoff. Be wary and definitely wash the black ones before wearing. Not sure if I’ll purchase from 90 degree again though. My Target leggings never stain.
customer_reviews.author: Sbr718

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9 and a lot of pants fit well about everything the ankle on me. These fit right as they should on the ankle. You can stretch them to make them longer or they’ll look fine being shorter, too. I have a long torso, so these hit right at my belly button but held in all the hip and waist “problem areas”. You will need to wash these shortly after trying on because they left a black dye under my nails. Luckily, it didn’t rub off anywhere else. They’re fine after one wash. Good quality fabric. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: I love these so so much :-) they're the perfect fit and really comfy I love the material and they make the booty look good- they're like lulu lemon leggings
customer_reviews.author: Gel

customer_reviews.title: Super thin like tights
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with the most recent reviews... I didn't have an older style of leggings to compare to but to me these are really thin. I prefer a sturdy legging and you can see my underwear lines immediately. They feel more like a tights and leggings mixed together kind of thin. Really disappointed because I looked on the internet for Amazon's best leggings and time and again 90 Degress by Reflex was the top suggested brand. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings, especially for $25!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these leggings. I couldn’t decide on the colors, so I bought two colors that I thought were similar but definitely not identical. You can see the comparison between the Dawn Pink and the Frosted Grape in my photos. I got the Small and I think it was the correct size. I would probably buy more in the future, especially if they came out with WHITE (seller, are you listening? We don’t wanna spend $80 on Alo white leggings but if you aren’t giving us the alternative, then we have to!). They seem to be high quality, and I like the high waist and side seams (see the 2018 vs 2019 style comparison they show)
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great but color did not match
customer_reviews.text: 5'5" 130lb but right now 145lbs post baby. Ordered the small and fits good. You can def. Go up to medium if you are taller or thicker below the waist. I have an athletic build. Thick stretchy material only downside was the ocean haze is not true to color. It is more of a grey blue than the pretty subtle aqua color shown in the pic. I have a dress that is a pretty subtle light blue that i thought would be the same for the pants base on Pictures but here is the difference. Still nice color just not what I expected or wanted. Keeping it though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, excellent stretch, good quality
customer_reviews.text: 5'5 250 lbs. I just got these today and already ordered me a second pair! The material feels amazing and they stretch very well. They have great tummy control which I needed because I'm 6 weeks post partum with a large lower abdomen still. The pockets are HUGE and you have one on BOTH sides!! It seems to me these are make of good quality material. I am very happy with my purchase and can't wait to get back to the gym with pants that actually fit and looks great. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: BPeeples

customer_reviews.title: Super tight on the belly, should have sized up
customer_reviews.text: I already owned a pair of leggings from this brand and I love them. The ones I have a super soft and not too tight on the waist but their only down fall is that they don't have pockets. So I got these. The color is cute, and I love the pockets, but I got the same size as my lower waisted ones and these are too tight. Literally my stomach hurts after wearing them. They do help flatten my belly but they're so tight I feel sick after wearing them for a long time. They're also not as soft as my other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G

customer_reviews.title: Keep or return
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these pants. The fit was amazing and lasted through my strength workout, but not my run. I had to pull them up a couple of times while I was running. Material is breathable, soft and absorbed sweat very well. Outside of the roll during the run these are a great pair of workout pants. I am torn between sending them back or keeping them with the roll.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: Not refunded
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately as too small with tags and packaging. Zero Returned immediately to the recommended place as I would not be needing them since They were too small , in the original packaging without being refunded. Amazon states they “refunded but tell me to call chase, I call chase and they say call Amazon. This has been going on for a year
customer_reviews.author: LAURIE LINNE

customer_reviews.title: Works for men, but be careful with sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" 185 pounds and ordered an XL thinking it would fit fine. I ended up sending the product back for a large instead. As a man, I don't have the hips you ladies have, so maybe that's why it fit differently? I've been doing Yoga for years but have recently gotten into crazy good shape and wanted something that didn't get in the way of my practice. Even though this product is designed for ladies, so far it's working just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: BlindBandit

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size XL and I'm usually a size XL in pants or about a size 14. These fit perfectly. I'm not a very big fan of leggings honestly, but thick thighs and shorts aren't always a good mix and jeans aren't always practical. These are thick and like a tight spandex material. Definitely squat proof. They come up just below my belly button which is great for my mom pouch. Only concern is how breathable they will be when it starts to get hot outside because they are indeed so thick.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: Long term holds up well!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! I have two pair now and want more. I love the pokets. Deep not shallow. Fits my note 8 with cover with plenty of room left over. Had now over a year, many washings, wear and work as a mechanic. They hold up!! Looking for more colors and fabrics now. Do not hesitate if wanting leggings with pockets. I am petite, heavy side. Length was perfect, rise right at my waste- not too high or too low. Not a super thin material, but also not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: kz

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I think I could actually live in these leggings. They're very soft, form fitting and they do have a bit of compression on the waist (no muffin top!! Hallelujah!). I got mine at a different store because I wasn't sure what the sizing would be like but I'm looking forward to ordering more from Amazon in different colors now that I know my size. Just a heads up, these do run a little big so if you're in between sizes, pick the smaller size. My measurments were: 32 inch waist, 44 inch hips, and I'm 5'7" 170 pounds. The medium fit me perfectly and aren't see through at all. Hope this helps a sister out 😘
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia C.

customer_reviews.title: Stained everything black!
customer_reviews.text: These pants literally stained my couch. I tried them on once I got them and sat down and there is a black stain where I sat. I soaked them in cold water 4 times in a row and they were still bleeding. I don’t understand the positive reviews on here at all. The material is also not soft and feels kind of rubbery.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: ☆ Cute, stretchy, versatile! ☆
customer_reviews.text: ☆ I N F O R M A T I O N ☆ + Bought silver berry and dawn pink I ordered these leggings in size s, in the color "silver berry" hoping for a more nude color, but these ended up being more muted gray/brown than anything! However, they are still cute, high-quality leggings. My dawn pink leggings are pretty true-to-color and are ultra-cute! ☆ P R O S ☆ + cute, trendy color selection + squat proof and can withstand a lot + stretchy, extra high waisted which I love + has pockets!! ☆ C O N S ☆ + color selection online might translate differently when ordered
customer_reviews.author: @KATHY_VU

customer_reviews.title: Substantial fabric, No show through
customer_reviews.text: It fits well, and the fabric is substantial so no show through. It’s not that warm tho. I wear it to ice skating mostly, and it works well for that. But in my area, it wouldn’t suffice for outdoor activities in the winter, tho it’ll be fine for cool spring/fall days. Fits nice, I like the waist band and even the slightly odd gusset (triangle instead of an oval-diamond) isn’t that uncomfortable. It’s a little long on me (I’m short, 5’2”) but that’s expected. The color is just a dark navy, not whatever weird alien green-metallic-grey they described it was. But I read someone’s review on the color and purchased this one precisely because it’s a dark navy.
customer_reviews.author: bluedevilborg

customer_reviews.title: High price low quality. Seams unravel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these about 2 months ago and wore them maybe 4 times. I noticed the stitching in the front on the pants near the crotch had an uneven seam. It began to unravel and now I have a small hole in the front crotch, lovely. Of course the return window has closed so I can't send them back. Paid way too much for a what was supposed to be a quality product. The feel and fit of the pants is really nice but falling apart after a few wears is ridiculous. Back to tjmax for workout pants that are just as good and half the price!
customer_reviews.author: DRich

customer_reviews.title: I’m covered in dye.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these pants, I was thrilled! They fit perfectly and they were exactly what I wanted. Unfortunately, just after the return window expired, I noticed that they are leaking dye all over the place. My knuckles turn black when I use the pockets, my knees are black when I take them off at the end of the day, and some of my clothes are darker than they were. I’m really disappointed that I can’t return these, because I feel like I’m going to be absorbing dye through my skin, and it’s destroying my other clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need my pants to stay up.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for work. I thought they would be perfect. It passed the bend/squat test. But it didn’t pass the high impact/movement test. I work in a warehouse where there’s a lot of walking, lifting, stretching, bending and squatting. These pants could not stay up. I spent most of my shift pulling my pants up. Not ideal for me cause I move at a fast pace. Although if my purpose was to wear them leisurely, run errands, and lay around the house these would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: eli kal

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality they once were.
customer_reviews.text: To add context, I I’m 5’6, 165 lbs. I ordered the 3/4 length in a large and although the fit was just right and added the compression I was looking for, the length was just too long. I have to roll them up 2-3 times to get that 3/4 length look (see below picture). At first I loved these pants, however after having them for a short 3 weeks, a hole has already formed in the crotch area. I’ve bought multiple pairs of the same brand throughout the past couple of years but I’m bummed that these just don’t provide the quality I was expecting. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaik Terry

customer_reviews.title: Run small.  Aren't soft and didn't seem breathable at all.  Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these making the rounds on blogs and Instagram, so I gave them a shot after the fave reviews. They were compared to Lululemon (which I've never worn) and several mentions of them being super soft and comfortable. I ordered a medium because that's what I normally wear across multiple brands. I could barely get these on. I know they are supposed to be compression style, but this was ridiculous. And from what I could tell, they seemed like they wouldn't be breathable at all, and weren't very soft, but rather kind of stiff? So I didn't even want to try a size up. Just returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, slightly strange smell
customer_reviews.text: These leggings fit me perfectly! I am 5'5'', around 135 Lb, and wear size 6 short jeans. These leggings are super opaque and thick and feel high quality. What I like the most is that the pockets can comfortably fit my iphone XR in both pockets!! My only concern what that when receiving the leggings, there was a slightly strange smell (like burnt plastic), and when I washed them for the first time the smell didn't got away. Not super intense, but wanted to let others know.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Sad!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t wait to wear these. Love the color and all my 90s are amazing, except this pair. Just putting them on this morning I putted the seams. These are not well made. The material is nice. Seem to be squat proof too but the makings of these suck!!! I’m so disappointed. As for the fit. I’m 5’8 152 and got a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Most of the stitching was already coming unraveled at soon as I took the leggings out of the packaging. The material is also very thin. I don't see these lasting as long as the Queenie Ke leggings.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5"0' / 107lbs. I wasn't sure what sizes fit me better so I ordered both XS and S. S was a little too loose around my knees and calves, XS was little thight around my waist. However, I don't like loose yoga pants so my pick was XS. But I made some modifications on it. I removed an elastic cord from the waist line. Now it fits me perfectly! It's very high quality yoga pants and I like the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Y.F.S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but very short
customer_reviews.text: Overall very comfortable leggings. I like that they have a nice bit of compression as well as pockets. My only complaint is that they’re incredibly short. I’m 5’11” and honestly, I don’t see these falling at or below the ankle on anyone over 5’5”. They’re also a little loose - a medium would probably fit me more how I like most leggings to fit. I might keep them as summer leggings since they look nice with sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable leggings!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pants for working out in and bartending and absolutely love them! I love how form fitting they are and that they have deep pockets in them for when I wear them to work. Not going to lie I couldn’t get them on at first because it was the end of the day and I had eaten, but just put them on this morning and slid right into them. They go to about your belly button, which is perfect because it tummy tucks the stomach area. The comfort of these are great too and I would probably compare them to under armor, which is what I used to wear in the fall/winter under my uniform when cheerleading.
customer_reviews.author: Austin D.

customer_reviews.title: Discoloration and loose threads...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these especially for after surgery. Arrived super late, so I couldn’t wear test or check when still fit. Struggling with operated leg to check fit after surgery and was happy the size m was good. When it became daylight, I noticed unhappy surprise; several threads are loose which is sloppy. Wouldn’t have complained there, but; also noticed multiple spots with discoloration.. Took tags of as soon as noticed I fitted these with swollen leg, so; can’t return.. Very disappointed and never expected this brand to be so sloppy..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel like a $25 pants. I bought a size S in Antique Rose, the color is much lighter than in the picture. It seemed to fit ok until I started to move, I had to keep pulling them up while walking on a treadmill. I think it has too much nylon so it doesn’t “hug” legs well. It also shows sweat stains and I am not an excessive sweater. Also, the waist band is very thick. Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: These leggings STAIN everything
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Hand-washed them and drip-dried AGAIN and they're still staining everything. These leggings STAIN everything. I got the black color. I washed them on cold and drip-dried, but they still stained everything they touched. My shirt, watch, purse, everything. I’m so disappointed! I really wanted to love these. They're an amazing fit + the cell phone pocket is awesome but ugh.
customer_reviews.author: laurentheanimal

customer_reviews.title: Overall great leggings, only minor flaws.
customer_reviews.text: These are great leggings with 90% of the qualities you would want in athletic wear. They’re soft, and supportive, they wash well, they keep cool while you work out, and most importantly they don’t show sweat marks at all. They’re only flaw is what prevents me from buying additional pairs; they show every single dimple, ripple, roll, cellulite pocket! This is confusing to me because they shape you so well. It’s almost like my cellulite looks WORSE in these leggings! They’re my favorite for at home workouts, but that’s it. If If this isn’t something you worry about or get distracted by, I recommend these 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My God. I read the good reviews, comparisons, etc. but did not think these would be as good as they are. I will literally never buy another pair of lululemon leggings again and I am a loyal customer all-the-way. I took off my $130 Lululemon pair to try these on and they are the SAME. Run, don't walk, and buy these. I already bought two pairs and will most likely buy at least 4-5 more. They are amazing! Size down 1! I wear a large in every legging ever and the mediums fit perfect. I am so so so happy to have found these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants! I have been wearing to the gym while running in the treadmill and lifting weights. They are very comfortable. I like the high rise I hold most of my weight in my tummy so these suck in my stomach in a little bit and do not slide down while I’m working out, which happened with some other yoga pats I have purchased in the past. I plan to buy more I normally buy a small in workout pants and a small fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: cassidy yoder

customer_reviews.title: 5'3 130 lbs Small fits but panty line shows
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 90 Degree By Reflex High Waist Interlink Yoga Pants in Blueberry Ice. Pros: really soft and they fit well (5'3 130 lbs size small - goes down to my ankles up to my rib cage). Con: You can see my panty line and this color stain easily (bought on Dec 26th. Ruined by Jan 20th)
customer_reviews.author: Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Dye everywhere just from try-on!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these leggings in black and was very excited to try them out based on all the positive reviews. Tried them on and they were a little tighter around my butt than expected, but otherwise the fit and length were perfect. My complaint and the reason I am returning them is that apparently the dye on the pants is transferrable (although there is no tag warning of that) and after only 5 minutes of having them on for a try-on, the inside of my white shirt had dark blue/black dye all over it. It was also on my hands and anything I touched. I've never had this experience with any other workout/yoga pants or leggings I've tried... not cool, man!
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: Fabric kind of smells
customer_reviews.text: So, I've bought from 90degrees before in the past and I REALLY loved their leggings that I got last year, but it seems they've changed their fabric again, the new fabric they use is super unbreathable and if you sit for an hour you're guaranteed a sweaty butt. I don't have this issue in their earlier leggings or any of my other brand leggings. Also, even after washing them, there's a weird plastic smell that lingers with them that was there when I opened the packaging. The pros: Pockets!!! The cons: Fabric, the smell on the fabric, breathability of the leggings
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Optimistic, But Left Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, which were very mixed, I decided it was worth the risk to order. I have other 90 Degree leggings that I previously purchased from TJ Max and love them. Unfortunately, these are NOT the same quality. The ones I received were made in China. And as others have written, they are completely see-through. They also have the kind of “stretch” that makes your legs look shiny. The material feels the same as the other leggings I have, but they are definitely not the same quality. I guess I’ll just have to dig through the racks at TJ Max to try and find another pair. I returned these the same day they were delivered.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, terrible dye
customer_reviews.text: Tried these since my favorite brand supplex fabric was sold out. These tights fit exactly the same-- fantastic, flattering, great support, and since I'm 5'4", they fit below the ankle. Was so excited when I tried them on only to discover my manicure ruined with black dye staining the polish, under fingernails, etc.! Hand washed/rinsed several times and wore them for the first time today, with no sign of dye transfer (but didn't sit on any light surfaces). Based on another reviewer who said the dye continued to be a problem, I'll keep these but will need to be careful, wash by hand, and avoid sitting on light colored furniture. Will need to try a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: TSR

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair. Love the bilateral thigh pockets on the side and small key pocket. Perfect for the gym and my hikes. I put my iPhone in one and use the other to carry dog bags should a pup go during a hike, car keys and a snack bar. Is it flattering with all that stuff - probably not but function is more important. I wear a medium and I’m 5’6 1/2 and fluctuate from 145-150
customer_reviews.author: zkat

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE THE BEST LEGGINGS I HAVE EVER BOUGHT
customer_reviews.text: My absolute fave leggings!!! Saw these on TikTok as a name brand dupe and they are PERFECT. The fit, the quality of the material, the pockets, the length, the thickness. Perfect for running, doesn't fall down. The ankle area doesn't stretch out. The butt is NOT see-through. I wear an XL/12-16 (depending on the pants, ordered these in a XL, and they fit great. LOVE LOVE LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Looked too small when I took it out of the package but it fits! I’m 5’2” and 138-140. Length was perfect for my short legs. Not see through in the tush area so no downward dog mishaps. Love the high waist and TWO deep side pockets. My iPhone 10 and my daughter’s plus both fit in the pockets. Perfect for sheltering in place when all you wear are leggings. Like that they washed and dried well too.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan&Mahina'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice & soft feeling, but tight in the legs.
customer_reviews.text: So, 90 degree uses either Nylon/Spandex, or Polyester/Spandex in their leggings. The Polyester leggings are softer & smoother than the Nylon ones- just an FYI. On the other hand, the Polyester ones sometimes are a tad bit shiny. The pair that I purchased here, have utility pockets on the side. But, they are a little tight in the lower leg area, which I don't like. And, these are kind of shiny, too (polyester). I would suggest sizing up with these. BTW- these should NEVER go into the dryer!! Cold wash only, on delicate. Also, the Spring Teal is a greenish color.
customer_reviews.author: The Red Rose

customer_reviews.title: These are my new favorite pants (for workouts and brunch)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pants, and am about to order them in every color. The material is so sturdy, and not see-through at all. They are very similar to the Wunder Under from Lululemon, but slightly thicker, so they're great for errands or brunch in colder climates. With these being high-waisted, they're perfect for yoga and held up through hot yoga as well. Second wear resulted in them being a little loose in the waist and hip area, but nothing too noticeable. Able to run in these without hiking them up every minute. Ordered a small, 5'3, 145lbs, generally 4/6 (6 in lululemon). Sized down based on other reviews, the medium would've been too large.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie Gedig

customer_reviews.title: Worse over time
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this package 3 different times (so I have 6 pairs of leggings). The first set I got fit amazing and made me very happy, this is why I was so excited to get more pairs. The second set I purchased were tighter and I could tell made from a different material. It's ok, I still wear them because they work. The third set I got were even smaller and the second I put them on the waistband ripped and now they do not stay up. I am very upset that the product is getting worse over time. I will not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, just like my expensive leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings! I was surprised at the quality of the material, its compatible to my $80 Zyia leggings. They fit perfectly in all the right ways as well. I am 5’2” 110 lbs for reference and I ordered an x-small. I originally ordered a small and they were too big so these fit true to my normal size. They have good compression and make your bum lift nicely while holding in the belly... but not uncomfortably. I’ll be ordering more in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: See through
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited about these after reading reviews. Then after opening the package and immediately performing the " pressed thumb " test on the leggings I was disappointed. I still tried them on and bent over in front of a mirror. No bueno. They are see through and I cannot wear them to campus, nor wear them at the gym and do so comfortably knowing every body and their mother can see right through my leggings. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Color “Aegean Sea” not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Five stars overall, as I love the pants in general. They fit well, are comfortable, and I love the pockets. I’m mostly posting to show other customers what the “Aegean Sea” color actually looks like, as it’s nothing like the photo. Which is a disappointment, as I really fell in love with the color in the photo. The photo shows a deep blue-teal, a peacock sort of color. The actual product is more of a muted medium green-teal. Definitely green, not blue at all. I kept it anyway because they are comfortable, but the color was not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, comfortable, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of these tights! I've been looking for this shade ever since I saw a similar pair at an athletics leggings shop, and this pair has the advantage of being 4 times cheaper. The material isn't the softest, but it's definitely comfortable enough to spend the day in, and also passes the squat test. Fits me quite well, only very slightly baggy around the ankles. Also love the pockets on either side. My phone fits in there perfectly! No more digging around in my purse when I go out :) happy with this product, may invest in other colors too.
customer_reviews.author: RachelB

customer_reviews.title: Would it kill you to be accurate?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT the leggings pictured. They aren't even the leggings reviewed by other buyers. ALL of those leggings were full length and I purchased according to that and to the title. I love 90 degree leggings because at 5'8" they're only of the only brands I'm not constantly pulling up and they comfortably reach my ankles. These are not those. Somewhere deep in the details it mentions 7/8 length- why not picture & title them accurately? Returning these is a waste of my time and spending 50+ hours a week campaigning I really needed them now. Thanks for nothing Reflex.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: It looks so good!
customer_reviews.text: I got leggings for an everyday wear. It doesn’t roll down which is a big plus and it looks really good. The material is a little on the stiffer side but it hold everything in place. For reference, I’m 5’5” and 148 pounds. Bust 38, waist 32, hips 40. I ordered a small and a medium. Both fit but I chose to keep the small and return the medium. The small fits tighter while the medium still has some room to grow but my goal is to lose my baby weight. It has an elastic band on the waist which is tighter but that’s what holds it in place. I’d recommend. I’ve already ordered 6 more pairs of leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife. She loves them. I got her a small since the size chart said that's what size she matches with. However, she likes to wear the top of the waistband at her belly button and says it's a little bit snug when she's sitting down or bending over. She weighs about 115 and is 5ft 4in. She looks fantastic in these.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan and Ambryn Hengst

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT CHANGE
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in the new style. I'm 5'10 and have an incredibly hard time finding pants that fit and are long enough, so these were my go-to. I lost 40 lbs and went to order Medium's instead of Larges, only to realize there is a new style that is shorter in the leg. They also fell down so much more. I ordered the Medium in the old style and they fit PERFECTLY. Unfortunately there is only Magenta Haze left. I am so disappointed by the change. Bring the old ones back!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: A mother’s dream in pants form
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased what feels like a bajillion pairs of leggings and yoga pants over the years. As a mom of two boys, I live in the things. I purchased my first pair of these pants and fell in love. I couldn’t believe that they were so comfortable, reasonably priced, had pockets, AND were completely not see-through. Such a thing could not exist, right??! Wrong. I now have 3 pairs in my closet. I also have to add...these pockets are no joke. I can literally fit a baby bottle and car keys in one pocket and a diaper, some wipes, and a toy in the other. I KID YOU NOT. These pockets are the ones of a mother’s dreams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did you change these once great leggings?!!
customer_reviews.text: What did you do to these fabulous leggings? I bought 2 pairs in November. LOVED them. Worse them a ton. I just bought 4 more and they are AWFUL! I noticed they smelled odd out of the package. Like cheap plastic. Then when I tried them on the are rough, scratchy, thin and SEE THROUGH. Why did you mess with a great thing? It’s so hard to find good leggings and I’m so upset you changed these!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabelauricella

customer_reviews.title: Runs a Tad Small
customer_reviews.text: These are quality for sure. Have been a big fan of 90 Degree for years. I purchased a couple from TJ Maxx for $14.99 about 3 years ago without "tummy control". Size small always fit me. I decide to orders these online this time. The small is too tight in the legs and stomach areas, not by a lot, but enough for me to return. I did not gain weight since TJ's purchase, and for reference I am a 5'6/130 pound-female. I would have tried a M by this brand, but I found another brand whose fit is more comfortable and a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be treated for dye preset!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and the pockets are a total game changer. But beware - the dye in this fabric will transfer to anything it touches - other clothing, furniture, leather car seats, everything! I have a lot of 90 Degree yoga pants and this has never happened before. Even though I washed them before wearing it didn’t stop the black dye from staining my white yoga top and my light living room furniture. Be sure to do a dye set pre soak on these. Vinegar and salt in cold water overnight. Ugh - a process that should have been taken care of by the manufacturer. Bad on you 90 Degree.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tes

customer_reviews.title: These are ok, the cotton are way better!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. I work delivering milk. These are nice and thick and move well as I'm climbing in and out of the van and moving 1000s of pounds of dairy products, but the coton ones are way better! These are longer and do NOT absorb sweat. Once you start sweating they feel slimy and disgusting like slug slime. I love the pockets! No worrying about pocket dialing or breaking your phone. Plenty of room for all my work stuff too such as box cutter, marker, gloves, etc... Can't wait till the cotton ones are back!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Evans

customer_reviews.title: Black 2019 high waist interlink yoga pants fabric is not as described!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the black 2019 high waist interlink yoga pants. These yoga pants are not as described. They are nice quality however, I was looking for 88% polyester and 12% spandex. What I received was 76% polyester and 24% spandex. Be aware of what you are looking for and order accordingly!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING leggings!! Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these leggings! 90 Degree by Reflex has the BEST leggings hand down! They are so comfy and sooo flattering. They are compression and have great tummy control! I have the 28inch powerflex ones too (which I wear all the time.) I usually don't like ankle leggings and find myself pulling on them. But these are perfect! I got the color potent purple and they look more like a cherry kind of color. Very beautiful! My measurements are 5'7, 150lbs, 40in hip. I'm usually a size large but the size chart suggested medium. They fit perfect! Going to be buying more colors. :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received these pants and realized I ordered a medium instead of a large (totally my fault), BUT...... I tried on the medium and they were a bit tight, but it gave me motivation to loose more weight (already down 15 pounds), so I will get a couple large pants, so they will fit a little better and as I start to lose more weight, the medium size will be just perfect. The quality of the pants were amazing, not too thick, not to thin and the pockets are nice to carry a phone in, keys, etc. I would definitely recommend this brand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Similar to LuLu
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium in Arctic Navy. For reference I am 5'5" 160 lbs 36 29 40 athletic build with most of my weight in my butt and thighs. These pants are thick, high waist, with great compression. I love the fact that they come in ankle length. Two large side pockets and one inner waistband pocket a little larger than a credit card. My phone didn't move when running or at the gym. They are squat proof, but not sweat proof. I sweat a lot and it did show through at the end of my workout just like all my other gym pants so not a big deal. I can tell these will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Lisi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, great for women who want a pant to make them appear slimmer
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and fit so well! They are so flattering. I wanted pants I could wear to yoga that wouldn’t roll and bunch up every time I bent over/down, these did the trick. Small women love lulu lemon, those of us that don’t have perfect everything love the extra support and compression in all the right places!
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Postpartum Option After a C Section
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a size up to wear after I gave birth to twins via c section. I love the high waist and more structured fabric. It’s thicker and helps to hide lumps and bumps that my thinner leggings don’t hide. Unfortunately, because of this they aren’t ideal to wear in the heat of summer, but are fine in AC. Only complaint: I’m 5’7” and these are way shorter than I expected. More like a cropped pant than a full length legging. But I still plan to order another pair in my usual size once I’m over this PP season
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Rolling waist
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these but they kept rolling at the waist every time I moved. I found myself adjusting them all day. Returned and will keep looking for some that don’t roll.
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: Workout leggings
customer_reviews.text: Pants are an excellent fabric and the pockets are super useful. The pockets are big enough for the plus sized phones/cases and keeps the phone secure while running or doing squats. The color of the pants are really nice and look just like the picture. I think the waist runs a little “high” even for high waisted pant. All in all, a good purchase for the money and I will continue to wear them. I would however recommend a darker color if you sweat a lot, because any type of moisture is easily seen.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great for wearing around the house
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and are very comfortable. They are best used for lounging around the house, doing chores and so on. I prefer a more performance material for working out, which these are not. The quality of the stitching is sub par and we returned the 1st pair because the entire crotch area came stitched within 5 minutes of wearing them for the first time. These are good but bit great quality. If you plan to work out in them, then look elsewhere. If you want a low cost around the house yoga pant then these will do.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Adams II

customer_reviews.title: DYE COMES OFF IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.text: DYE COMES OFF! I just tried these pants on & they felt great (keep reading). They were very smooth and fit as expected (got a small). I thought this was a complete win, but I looked down and my hands were dyed black!! I had them on for less than 2 minutes - it was just from me putting them on. The dye rubs right off. I’m glad I caught this before I washed them and it ruined other clothes. I attached a photo of my hands after trying the pants on and then my hands washed so everyone could see how drastically the dye comes off so easily. I’ll be returning these immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Waist is always falling
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute and they fit nice but the waist is constantly falling down so I don’t know if I should get a smaller size becsuse they’re already tight but the waist moves around a lot it doesn’t like to stay in place. Other than that they’re not see through look cute and are just the right length. I ordered a small and I’m 5”10 and weigh 140
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed. Dyed my skin, phone case and watch black!
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed by these leggings. First off, they died my skin, my phone and my Fitbit band black during my 4 mile walk. Secondly, they had a hole in the crotch which I didn’t notice until after I worked out. Since I used them and took of the tags I can’t return them but I am very disappointed. Going to wash them a few more times and see them up and hopefully I’ll be able to use them but I genuinely think I may just have to throw them out if they keep dying my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sylish!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with these leggings! The dark charcoal color is perfect and I am glad to have a non-black option. They are great for casual/active wear or could be worn with boots and a cute sweater. I originally ordered the Large but the fit was too snug around my waist...I exchanged for an XL and they are perfect! I am 5'5", usually wear a Large top and 14/16 pants. Some of the other reviewers commented that their pants were see-through, but I do not have any issues at all with the XL pair that I have. I have washed and air dried them and they came out great. Definetly recommend these leggings!
customer_reviews.author: salem1982

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: These are thick without being heavy, and the quality feels very good- however there are some issues. These leggings do not provide support or shape in any of the right places. I have many pairs of athletic leggings and these are by far the least flattering because of this. I also did not find the material to be breathable at all, which makes them quite uncomfortable to wear during more intense workouts. I'm keeping them because I like the placement of the pockets and again, they seem like good quality. Just wish they'd been better.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not the same material/fit amongst the same leggings.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same material amongst same leggings. I have ordered mediums in the past & the intersellar color leggings are thinner and nowhere near the same fit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Really good leggings
customer_reviews.text: Material felt good, this is my second buy and that’s because of the material and how much it has moisture control. Why are the calf section so big though, not everyone has big calf but it’s not noticeable. I did my first workout it these but I must say the stitching at the backside is getting loose, and there r some fine lines in the front. Overall I’ll Buy more especially the darker colors, can’t go wrong with those because my first dark colored one was perfect. I would recommend especially for high intensity workout or weight lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Terryann

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are the absolute BEST leggings I have ever worn. They are the perfect material; they aren't shiny like a workout legging, but they are more substantial than cotton. I've been wearing them for nearly 3 days straight and they haven't bagged out or lost their shape in any way. I have worked out in them, and chased around after a toddler. I will come back and buy these until they stop making them. I hope they never do! You will not regret buying these bad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I made this purchase! I have been working out for about 7 weeks now and wanted to treat myself to something cute to workout in... or lounge in, because, my body my choice! Anyway, I own my fair share of leggings but these are absolutely my new favorite! I am happy to report that I did not have to keep pulling up my pants while bending, squatting, lunging, or doing ab routines... it was so awesome! They stayed in place, just like it promised, and they’re snug enough they give a good lift and shape. Comfortable, cute and functional... a real triple threat! I’m already looking for different colors to buy next!
customer_reviews.author: Jacybeth1983

customer_reviews.title: Significant Bleeding - Don't sit on anything light
customer_reviews.text: Significant Bleeding! I tried them on upon receiving and I sat on a cream pillow and chair for the next couple hours. When I got up later the pillow had turned grey; the black dye bled into the material. Additionally, the dye got on to my skin and fingernails and it took a lot of washing to get it out. My recommendation would be not to wear without washing first, but once you wash I doubt you can return. Buyer beware! I haven't washed them so I don't know if the bleeding stops after wash. I'm likely to return them.
customer_reviews.author: WW K. F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fabric and fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The fabric is so silky. It's substantial, stretchy but supportive. A bit heavier than my Lululemon capris. I love that these truly come all the way up to my natural waist and stay there. The waistband is wide for extra support. The crotch does not ride up. I am 5'4" and wear a size 12 jeans, and the fit is perfect for me. I have short legs for my height and the length comes to my ankles (not longer) - but I think on a taller person the legs would stretch longer. I will definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, never paying LuLulemon ridiculously high prices again
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am never gonna pay for LuLulemon clothing again!! I just got these leggings and they’re awesome I love the side pockets for my cell phone they fit great.The hangtag had a price of $88 on these pants, not sure why, however I only paid $26. very happy, they’re excellent quality Also I got a jacket which is exactly like a Lululemon jacket but less than half the price. So happy to have found 90degrees - I’ll be a loyal customer from now on!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Waist support (roll stuffer inner) isn't so supportive.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore that these have pockets and they're quite flattering on my derriere but alas they definitely don't quite meet my mark for my tummy area. I had previously ordered these in a medium and sadly they gave me the ol dastardly camel toe so I sized up and now the high wasted amazingness isn't so amazing. I want to love these but they're giving me folds where folds don't exist. 4 stars for pockets that hold my stuffs even bending over and the righteous butt lift.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Wash before wearing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of leggings, **BUT** I put them on the day I got them in the mail, they dye-stained my skin and everything I sat on before I realized it... caused an absolute nightmare for my living room furniture. Machine wash first!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MBquist

product_meta.title: 90 Degree By Reflex Womens Power Flex Yoga Pants
feature_bullets: HIGH WAIST TUMMY CONTROL. Our womens active leggings offer a high waistband for better tummy control. Say goodbye to muffin top and hello to a smooth, flat stomach. These high waisted slimming leggings provide gentle compression to your midsection, giving you a toned and trim look. Our high rise workout leggings are a popular women’s style for their excellent fit and soft comfort. The 4 ½ inch high waistband gives women that extra boost of confidence to look and feel their best.

SMARTPHONE POCKETS. The Power Flex Yoga Pants have two side pockets for your phone and easy storage on the go. Stop worrying about where to put your phone while you workout. These active leggings for women feature two smartphone pockets on the hips, which easily holds your phone or other essentials. Simply slip your phone into the pocket and carry on with your activities. Innovative and stylish, these leggings are designed for today’s busy, multitasking woman.

CONTOUR DESIGN DETAILS. Our womens workout leggings are a slightly shorter length, with a 25” inseam. These 7⁄8 length exercise pants are designed for the stylish woman in the gym, on the go, or relaxing at home. Made of 86% Polyester, 14% Spandex, these exercise pants for women are the perfect blend of comfort. The reflective logo on the center back adds a little touch of visual interest to these otherwise neutral leggings.

RELIABLE, WELL-LOVED BRAND. 90 Degree by Reflex is a lifestyle brand that combines style, comfort, fit, and performance. The high quality activewear is both affordable and accessible, perfect for fitness enthusiasts and everyday athleisure. Rest assured that you will receive a quality product from Amazon’s #1 seller of athletic leggings and other athleisure products. Consumers love our products and reviews speak for themselves. Get on board with the brand that men and women are raving about!

30-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. 90 Degree by Reflex’s products are sold with a 30-day, full-money-back warranty and can be returned no questions asked. Add this item to your cart by clicking the "Add-to-Cart" button and buy it now. We run out of inventory quickly, so order now while colors and styles last.
